conversation_title.chinese_pinyin: dì yī cì zài jī chǎng
conversation_title.oromo: Yeroo Jalqabaa Aanaa Xiyyaaraa Irra Galuu
conversation_title.oromo_phonetic: ye-roo jal-qa-baa aa-naa xiy-yaa-raa ir-ra ga-luu
conversation_title.somali: Mar ugu horraysa ee Garoonka Dayuuradaha
conversation_title.somali_phonetic: mar u-gu hor-ray-sa ey ga-roon-ka da-yuu-ra-da-ha
conversation_title.swahili: Mara ya Kwanza Katika Uwanja wa Ndege
conversation_title.swahili_phonetic: ma-ra ya kwan-za ka-ti-ka u-wan-ja wa n-de-ge
conversation_title.kinyarwanda: Igihe cya Mbere mu Kimi cy'indege
conversation_title.kinyarwanda_phonetic: i-gi-he cha m-be-re mu ki-mi chi-n-de-ge
conversation_title.kirundi: Umwanya wa Mbere mu Kimi c'indege
conversation_title.kirundi_phonetic: u-mwa-nya wa m-be-re mu ki-mi chi-n-de-ge

chinese_pinyin: háng kōng gōng sī dài lǐ

scenario.english: A traveler visits an airport for the first time and needs assistance with check-in
scenario.spanish: Un viajero visita un aeropuerto por primera vez y necesita ayuda con el check-in
scenario.spanish_phonetic: oon vya-he-ro vee-si-ta oon ah-eh-ro-pwer-to por pree-me-rah ves ee ne-se-si-ta a-yoo-da kon el chek-in
scenario.french: Un voyageur visite un aéroport pour la première fois et a besoin d'aide pour l'enregistrement
scenario.french_phonetic: un vwa-ya-zher vee-zeet un ah-eh-ro-por poor lah preh-myehr fwah ey ah be-zwahn ded poor lon-re-zhis-treh-mahn
scenario.italian: Un viaggiatore visita un aeroporto per la prima volta e ha bisogno di assistenza con il check-in
scenario.italian_phonetic: oon vyaj-ja-to-re vee-si-ta un ah-eh-ro-por-to per lah pree-ma vol-ta ey ah bi-zo-nyo di as-sis-ten-tsa kon il chek-in
scenario.chinese: 一位旅行者第一次到机场，需要办理登机手续的帮助
scenario.chinese_pinyin: yī wèi lǚ xíng zhě dì yī cì dào jī chǎng, xū yào bàn lǐ dēng jī shǒu xù de bāng zhù
scenario.arabic: مسافر يزور مطاراً لأول مرة ويحتاج مساعدة في تسجيل الوصول
scenario.arabic_phonetic: mu-sa-fir ya-zoor ma-ta-ran li-aw-wal mar-ra wa yah-taaj mu-saa-da fee tas-jeel al-wu-sool
scenario.amharic: መጓዝ የሚፈልግ ሰው ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ አየር ማረፊያ ይጎበኛል እና በቼክ ኢን እርዳታ ያስፈልገዋል
scenario.amharic_phonetic: me-gwaz ye-mi-fe-leg sew le-me-je-me-ri-ya gi-ze a-yer ma-re-fi-ya yi-go-ben-yal e-na be-chek in ir-da-ta ya-se-fe-leg-e-wal
scenario.tigrinya: ሰፋሪ ንቀዳማይ ግዜ ኣብ መዕረፊ ነፈርቲ ይእቱ እሞ ኣብ check-in ሓገዝ የድልዮ
scenario.tigrinya_phonetic: se-fa-ri nqe-da-may gize ab me'erefi neferti y'itu imo ab chek-in h'agez yedliyo
scenario.oromo: Kuftuun aanaa xiyyaaraa yeroo jalqabaa tajaajilaafi check-in irratti gargaarsa barbaada
scenario.oromo_phonetic: kuf-tuun aa-naa xiy-yaa-raa ye-roo jal-qa-baa ta-jaa-ji-laa-fi chek-in ir-rat-ti gar-gaar-sa bar-baa-da
scenario.somali: Safaruhu mar ugu horreysa garoonka dayuuradaha booqdaa waxuuna u baahan yahay caawimaad check-in
scenario.somali_phonetic: sa-fa-ru-hu mar u-gu hor-ray-sa ga-roon-ka da-yuu-ra-da-ha booq-daa wa-xuu-na u baa-han ya-hay caa-wi-maad chek-in
scenario.hadiyaa: Mo'otta shaaraawaa heettino maaxxino shaaraawaa awwallaa koshhe wo check-in irratti gargaarsa be'e
scenario.hadiyaa_phonetic: mo-o-tta shaa-raa-waa hey-ti-no maax-xi-no shaa-raa-waa a-wal-laa kosh-she wo chek-in ir-rat-ti gar-gaar-sa be-e
scenario.wolayitta: Dobeesaa aeroporto maccaatiissi ke aeroporto ke ge'e wo check-in irratti gargaarsa be'e
scenario.wolayitta_phonetic: do-bey-saa a-e-ro-por-to ma-chaa-tii-ssi ke a-e-ro-por-to ke ge-e wo chek-in ir-rat-ti gar-gaar-sa be-e
scenario.afar: Safar Ku-Duudum ke Ferim Bada ke wo Check-in irra Gargaarsa Be'e
scenario.afar_phonetic: sa-far ku-duu-dum ke fe-rim ba-da ke wo chek-in ir-ra gar-gaar-sa be-e
scenario.gamo: Oshshaa aeroporto ta'ati hank'aa ke aeroporto ke giddona wo check-in irratti gargaarsa be'e
scenario.gamo_phonetic: osh-shaa a-e-ro-por-to ta-a-ti han-kaa ke a-e-ro-por-to ke gid-do-na wo chek-in ir-rat-ti gar-gaar-sa be-e
scenario.swahili: Msafiri anatembelea uwanja wa ndege kwa mara ya kwanza na anahitaji usaidizi katika check-in
scenario.swahili_phonetic: m-sa-fi-ri a-na-tem-be-le-a u-wan-ja wa n-de-ge kwa ma-ra ya kwan-za na a-na-hi-ta-ji u-sa-i-di-zi ka-ti-ka chek-in
scenario.kinyarwanda: Umugenzi agenda gusura kimi cy'indege bwa mbere kandi akeneye ubufasha mu check-in
scenario.kinyarwanda_phonetic: u-mu-gen-zi a-gen-da gu-su-ra ki-mi chi-n-de-ge bwa m-be-re kan-di a-ke-ne-ye u-bu-fa-sha mu chek-in
scenario.kirundi: Umugenzi agenda gusura kimi c'indege bwa mbere kandi akeneye ubufasha mu check-in
scenario.kirundi_phonetic: u-mu-gen-zi a-gen-da gu-su-ra ki-mi chi-n-de-ge bwa m-be-re kan-di a-ke-ne-ye u-bu-fa-sha mu chek-in
scenario.luo: Japiny nyuolo airport mar achiel kata miyo gi kony e check-in
scenario.luo_phonetic: ja-piny nyu-o-lo air-port mar a-chiel ka-ta mi-yo gi ko-ny e chek-in

exchanges.speaker: Airline Agent
exchanges.english: Good morning! Welcome to Addis Ababa International Airport. Do you have your passport and ticket ready?
exchanges.spanish: ¡Buenos días! Bienvenido al Aeropuerto Internacional de Addis Abeba. ¿Tiene su pasaporte y billete listos?
exchanges.spanish_phonetic: bwe-nos dee-as! byen-ve-nee-do al ah-eh-ro-pwer-to in-ter-na-syo-nal de ad-dis a-be-ba. tye-ne su pa-sa-por-te ee bee-lye-te lees-tos?
exchanges.french: Bonjour ! Bienvenue à l'Aéroport International d'Addis-Abeba. Avez-vous votre passeport et votre billet prêts ?
exchanges.french_phonetic: bon-zhoor! byen-ve-nu a lah-eh-ro-por in-ter-na-syo-nal da-dis a-be-ba. ah-veh voo vo-tre pas-por ey vo-tre bee-yeh preh?
exchanges.italian: Buongiorno! Benvenuto all'Aeroporto Internazionale di Addis Abeba. Ha il passaporto e il biglietto pronti?
exchanges.italian_phonetic: bwon-jor-no! ben-ve-nu-to al-lah-eh-ro-por-to in-ter-na-tsyo-na-le di ad-dis a-be-ba. ah il pas-sa-por-to ey il bi-lyet-to pron-ti?
exchanges.chinese: 早上好！欢迎来到亚的斯亚贝巴国际机场。您的护照和机票准备好了吗？
exchanges.chinese_pinyin: zǎo shàng hǎo! huān yíng lái dào yà de sī yà bèi bā guó jì jī chǎng. nín de hù zhào hé jī piào zhǔn bèi hǎo le ma?
exchanges.arabic: صباح الخير! مرحباً بكم في مطار أديس أبابا الدولي. هل لديك جواز السفر والتذكرة جاهزان؟
exchanges.arabic_phonetic: sa-bah al-khayr! mar-ha-ban bi-kum fee ma-tar a-dees a-ba-ba ad-do-wa-li. hal la-dee-ka ja-waz as-sa-far wat-tath-ki-ra ja-hi-zaan?
exchanges.amharic: እንኳን ደህና መጡ! ወደ አዲስ አበባ ዓለም አቀፍ አየር ማረፊያ እንኳን ደህና መጡ። ፓስፖርትዎን እና ትኬትዎን ዝግጁ ናቸው?
exchanges.amharic_phonetic: en-kwan deh-na me-tu! we-de a-dis a-be-ba a-lem a-qef a-yer ma-re-fi-ya en-kwan deh-na me-tu. pas-port-wo-nen e-na ti-ket-wo-nen zig-ju na-chew?
exchanges.tigrinya: እንቋዕ ሰናይ! ናብ ዓለምለኻዊ መዕረፊ ነፈርቲ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ብደሓን መጻእኩም። ፓስፖርትኹምን ትኬትኹምን ኣዳውም ድዮም?
exchanges.tigrinya_phonetic: en-qwa'e senay! nab a'lemlekawi me'erefi neferti adis abeba bdehan metsa'ekum. pas-port-khumen tiket-khumen adawum diyom?
exchanges.oromo: Akkam bulte! Aanaa Xiyyaaraa Addiis Ababaa Addunyaa irratti akkam bulte! Paasportii fi tikeetii keessan qopheessaa jirtuu?
exchanges.oromo_phonetic: ak-kam bul-te! aa-naa xiy-yaa-raa ad-diis a-ba-baa ad-dun-yaa ir-rat-ti ak-kam bul-te! paas-por-tii fi ti-key-tii keys-san qo-pheys-saa jir-tuu?
exchanges.somali: Subax wanaagsan! Soo dhawoow Garoonka Caalamiga ah ee Addis Ababa. Ma haysaa baasaboorkaaga iyo tikaatadaaga diyaar?
exchanges.somali_phonetic: su-bax wa-naag-san! soo dha-woow ga-roon-ka caa-la-mi-ga ah ey ad-dis a-ba-ba. ma hay-saa baa-sa-boor-kaa-ga i-yo ti-kaa-ta-daa-ga di-yaar?
exchanges.hadiyaa: Hank'anam be'no! Aanaa Xiyyaaraa Addis Ababa Heettino ayaan be'e? Paasportii fi tikeetii keessan qopheessaa jirtuu?
exchanges.hadiyaa_phonetic: han-ka-na-m bey-no! aa-naa xiy-yaa-raa ad-dis a-ba-ba hey-ti-no a-yaan be-e? paas-por-tii fi ti-key-tii keys-san qo-pheys-saa jir-tuu?
exchanges.wolayitta: Oottanata wolqaa! Aeroporto Addis Ababa wo'iya. Paasportii fi tikeetii keessan qopheessaa jirtuu?
exchanges.wolayitta_phonetic: oot-ta-na-ta wol-kaa! a-e-ro-por-to ad-dis a-ba-ba wo-i-ya. paas-por-tii fi ti-key-tii keys-san qo-pheys-saa jir-tuu?
exchanges.afar: Barrih Qaadih! Ferim Bada Addis Ababa Akah. Paasportii fi Tikeetii Keessan Qopheessaa Jirtuu?
exchanges.afar_phonetic: bar-rih qaa-dih! fe-rim ba-da ad-dis a-ba-ba a-kah. paas-por-tii fi ti-key-tii keys-san qo-pheys-saa jir-tuu?
exchanges.gamo: Halaqa wolqaa! Aeroporto Addis Ababa he'iya. Paasportii fi tikeetii keessan qopheessaa jirtuu?
exchanges.gamo_phonetic: ha-la-qa wol-kaa! a-e-ro-por-to ad-dis a-ba-ba he-i-ya. paas-por-tii fi ti-key-tii keys-san qo-pheys-saa jir-tuu?
exchanges.swahili: Habari ya asubuhi! Karibu katika Uwanja wa Ndege wa Kimataifa wa Addis Ababa. Una pasipoti yako na tiketi yako tayari?
exchanges.swahili_phonetic: ha-ba-ri ya a-su-bu-hi! ka-ri-bu ka-ti-ka u-wan-ja wa n-de-ge wa ki-ma-ta-i-fa wa ad-dis a-ba-ba. u-na pa-si-po-ti ya-ko na ti-ke-ti ya-ko ta-ya-ri?
exchanges.kinyarwanda: Mwaramutse neza! Murakaza neza mu Kimi cy'indege Mpuzamahanga cya Addis Ababa. Mufite pasiporo yanyu na tiketi zanyu ziteguye?
exchanges.kinyarwanda_phonetic: mwa-ra-mu-tse ne-za! mu-ra-ka-za ne-za mu ki-mi chi-n-de-ge mpu-za-ma-han-ga cha ad-dis a-ba-ba. mu-fi-te pa-si-po-ro ya-nyu na ti-ke-ti za-nyu zi-te-gu-ye?
exchanges.kirundi: Mwaramutse neza! Murakaza neza mu Kimi c'indege Mpuzamahanga ca Addis Ababa. Mufite pasiporo yanyu na tiketi zanyu ziteguye?
exchanges.kirundi_phonetic: mwa-ra-mu-tse ne-za! mu-ra-ka-za ne-za mu ki-mi chi-n-de-ge mpu-za-ma-han-ga cha ad-dis a-ba-ba. mu-fi-te pa-si-po-ro ya-nyu na ti-ke-ti za-nyu zi-te-gu-ye?
exchanges.luo: Oriti! Pok e Airport mar Addis Ababa. In gi passport gi ticket matut?
exchanges.luo_phonetic: o-ri-ti! pok e air-port mar ad-dis a-ba-ba. in gi pas-port gi ti-ket ma-tut?

exchanges.speaker: Passenger
exchanges.english: Good morning! Yes, here's my passport and my e-ticket. I'm flying to Nairobi.
exchanges.spanish: ¡Buenos días! Sí, aquí está mi pasaporte y mi e-ticket. Vuelo a Nairobi.
exchanges.spanish_phonetic: bwe-nos dee-as! see, ah-kee es-ta mee pa-sa-por-te ee mee e-ti-ket. bwe-lo a nai-ro-bi.
exchanges.french: Bonjour ! Oui, voici mon passeport et mon e-billet. Je vole vers Nairobi.
exchanges.french_phonetic: bon-zhoor! wee, vwa-see mon pas-por ey mon e-bee-yeh. zhe vol ver nai-ro-bi.
exchanges.italian: Buongiorno! Sì, ecco il mio passaporto e il mio e-ticket. Volo per Nairobi.
exchanges.italian_phonetic: bwon-jor-no! see, ek-ko il mee-o pas-sa-por-to ey il mee-o e-ti-ket. vo-lo per nai-ro-bi.
exchanges.chinese: 早上好！是的，这是我的护照和电子机票。我要飞往内罗毕。
exchanges.chinese_pinyin: zǎo shàng hǎo! shì de, zhè shì wǒ de hù zhào hé diàn zǐ jī piào. wǒ yào fēi wǎng nèi luó bì.
exchanges.arabic: صباح الخير! نعم، هذا هو جواز سفري وتذكرتي الإلكترونية. أنا ذاهب إلى نيروبي.
exchanges.arabic_phonetic: sa-bah al-khayr! na-am, ha-tha hu ja-waz sa-fa-ree wa tath-ki-ra-tee al-elek-tro-nee-ya. a-na tha-hib i-la nai-roo-bi.
exchanges.amharic: እንኳን ደህና መጡ! አዎ፣ ይሄ ፓስፖርቴ እና ኤ-ትኬቴ ነው። ወደ ናይሮቢ እበራለሁ።
exchanges.amharic_phonetic: en-kwan deh-na me-tu! a-wo, yih-e pas-por-tey e-na e-ti-ket-ey new. we-de nai-ro-bi e-be-ra-le-hu.
exchanges.tigrinya: እንቋዕ ሰናይ! እወ፣ እዚ ፓስፖርተይን ኤ-ትኬተይን እዩ። ናብ ናይሮቢ እየ ዝብርህ።
exchanges.tigrinya_phonetic: en-qwa'e senay! ewe, izi pas-porteyn eyn e-tiketeyn iyu. nab nairobi iye zebrih.
exchanges.oromo: Akkam bulte! Eeyyee, as paasportii koo fi e-tikeetii koo jira. Naayiroobii deema.
exchanges.oromo_phonetic: ak-kam bul-te! ey-yey-e, as paas-por-tii koo fi e-ti-key-tii koo ji-ra. naa-yi-roo-bii dey-ma.
exchanges.somali: Subax wanaagsan! Haa, halkan waa baasaboorkayga iyo e-tikaatadayga. Waxaan duulayaa Nairobi.
exchanges.somali_phonetic: su-bax wa-naag-san! haa, hal-kan waa baa-sa-boor-kay-ga i-yo e-ti-kaa-ta-day-ga. wa-xaan duu-la-yaa nai-ro-bi.
exchanges.hadiyaa: Hank'anam be'no! Eeyyee, as paasportii koo fi e-tikeetii koo jira. Nairobi deema.
exchanges.hadiyaa_phonetic: han-ka-na-m bey-no! ey-yey-e, as paas-por-tii koo fi e-ti-key-tii koo ji-ra. nai-ro-bi dey-ma.
exchanges.wolayitta: Oottanata wolqaa! Eeyyee, as paasportii koo fi e-tikeetii koo jira. Nairobi deema.
exchanges.wolayitta_phonetic: oot-ta-na-ta wol-kaa! ey-yey-e, as paas-por-tii koo fi e-ti-key-tii koo ji-ra. nai-ro-bi dey-ma.
exchanges.afar: Barrih Qaadih! Eeyyee, As Paasportii Koo fi E-tikeetii Koo Jira. Nairobi Deema.
exchanges.afar_phonetic: bar-rih qaa-dih! ey-yey-e, as paas-por-tii koo fi e-ti-key-tii koo ji-ra. nai-ro-bi dey-ma.
exchanges.gamo: Halaqa wolqaa! Eeyyee, as paasportii koo fi e-tikeetii koo jira. Nairobi deema.
exchanges.gamo_phonetic: ha-la-qa wol-kaa! ey-yey-e, as paas-por-tii koo fi e-ti-key-tii koo ji-ra. nai-ro-bi dey-ma.
exchanges.swahili: Habari ya asubuhi! Ndio, hii ni pasipoti yangu na tiketi yangu ya elektroniki. Ninasafiri kwenda Nairobi.
exchanges.swahili_phonetic: ha-ba-ri ya a-su-bu-hi! n-di-o, hi-i ni pa-si-po-ti ya-ngu na ti-ke-ti ya-ngu ya e-lek-tro-ni-ki. ni-na-sa-fi-ri kwen-da nai-ro-bi.
exchanges.kinyarwanda: Mwaramutse neza! Yego, iyi ni pasiporo yanjye na tiketi yanjye ya electroniki. Ngiye muri Nairobi.
exchanges.kinyarwanda_phonetic: mwa-ra-mu-tse ne-za! ye-go, i-yi ni pa-si-po-ro ya-njye na ti-ke-ti ya-njye ya e-lek-tro-ni-ki. ngi-ye mu-ri nai-ro-bi.
exchanges.kirundi: Mwaramutse neza! Yego, iyi ni pasiporo yanjye na tiketi yanjye ya electroniki. Ngiye muri Nairobi.
exchanges.kirundi_phonetic: mwa-ra-mu-tse ne-za! ye-go, i-yi ni pa-si-po-ro ya-njye na ti-ke-ti ya-njye ya e-lek-tro-ni-ki. ngi-ye mu-ri nai-ro-bi.
exchanges.luo: Oriti! Ee, gin passporta gi ticket e. Aromo e Nairobi.
exchanges.luo_phonetic: o-ri-ti! ey, gin pas-por-ta gi ti-ket e. a-ro-mo e nai-ro-bi.

exchanges.speaker: Airline Agent
exchanges.english: Thank you. Do you have any checked baggage today?
exchanges.french: Merci. Avez-vous des bagages enregistrés aujourd'hui?
exchanges.french_phonetic: mer-see. ah-veh voo deh ba-gazh on-re-zhis-treh oh-zhoor-dwee?
exchanges.italian: Grazie. Ha bagaglio da stiva oggi?
exchanges.italian_phonetic: gra-tsye. ah ba-gal-yo da stee-va oj-ji?
exchanges.chinese: 谢谢。您今天有托运行李吗？
exchanges.chinese_pinyin: xiè xie. nín jīn tiān yǒu tuō yùn xíng lǐ ma?
exchanges.arabic: شكراً لك. هل لديك أمتعة مسجلة اليوم؟
exchanges.arabic_phonetic: shuk-ran lak. hal la-dee-k a-ma-ta'a mu-sal-la al-yawm?
exchanges.tigrinya: የቐንየለይ። ሎሚ ክትከልክል ዝኸውን እታን ኣለኻ?
exchanges.tigrinya_phonetic: ye-q'eniley. lomi ktekelkel zkhewin itan aleka?
exchanges.oromo: Galatoomaa. Har'a baagaajii feetuu keessan jira?
exchanges.oromo_phonetic: ga-la-too-maa. har'a baa-gaa-jii fey-tuu keys-san ji-ra?
exchanges.somali: Mahadsanid. Ma haysaa alaabta lagu sheegay maanta?
exchanges.somali_phonetic: ma-had-sa-nid. ma hay-saa a-laab-ta la-gu shey-ga-y maan-ta?
exchanges.swahili: Asante. Una mizigo ya kupaki leo?
exchanges.swahili_phonetic: a-san-te. u-na mi-zi-go ya ku-pa-ki le-o?
exchanges.luo: Erokamano. In gi chuo e yieyo?
exchanges.luo_phonetic: e-ro-ka-ma-no. in gi chuo e yi-eyo?

exchanges.speaker: Passenger
exchanges.english: Yes, I have one suitcase and this carry-on bag.
exchanges.spanish: Sí, tengo una maleta y este equipaje de mano.
exchanges.spanish_phonetic: see, ten-go oo-na ma-le-ta ee es-te e-kee-pa-he de ma-no.
exchanges.french: Oui, j'ai une valise et ce bagage à main.
exchanges.french_phonetic: wee, zhey oon va-leez ey se ba-gazh a man.
exchanges.italian: Sì, ho una valigia e questo bagaglio a mano.

exchanges.arabic: نعم، لدي حقيبة واحدة وهذه الحقيبة اليدوية.

exchanges.speaker: Airline Agent
exchanges.english: Please place your suitcase on the scale. Would you like a window or aisle seat?
exchanges.spanish: Por favor, coloque su maleta en la báscula. ¿Prefiere asiento de ventana o de pasillo?
exchanges.spanish_phonetic: por fa-vor, ko-lo-ke su ma-le-ta en la bas-ku-la. pre-fye-re a-syen-to de ven-ta-na o de pa-see-yo?
exchanges.french: Veuillez placer votre valise sur la balance. Préférez-vous un siège côté hublot ou côté couloir?
exchanges.french_phonetic: vey-yeh pla-sey vo-tre va-leez sur lah ba-lans. pre-fe-reh voo un syezh ko-teh u-blo oo ko-teh koo-lwar?
exchanges.italian: Per favore, metta la sua valigia sulla bilancia. Preferisce un posto finestrino o corridoio?
exchanges.italian_phonetic: per fa-vo-re, met-ta la sua va-lee-ja sul-la bee-lan-cha. pre-fe-ri-she un po-sto fi-ne-stree-no o kor-ri-doy-o?
exchanges.chinese: 请把您的行李箱放在秤上。您想要靠窗还是靠过道的座位？
exchanges.chinese_pinyin: qǐng bǎ nín de xíng lǐ xiāng fàng zài chèng shàng. nín xiǎng yào kào chuāng hái shì kào guò dào de zuò wèi?
exchanges.arabic: يرجى وضع حقيبتك على الميزان. هل تفضل مقعد نافذة أم ممر؟
exchanges.arabic_phonetic: yar-ja wad-haq-ree-ba-tak a-la al-mee-zaan. hal tu-fad-dil maq-ad na-fi-tha am mam-mar?
exchanges.amharic: እባክዎን ሻንቃዎን በሚዛኑ ላይ ያስቀምጡ። የመስኮት ወይስ የመንገድ መቀመጫ ይፈልጋሉ?
exchanges.amharic_phonetic: e-bak-won shan-qa-won be-mi-za-nu lay ya-se-qe-mit-u. ye-mes-kot wo-yis ye-menged me-ke-me-cha yi-fe-leg-alu?
exchanges.tigrinya: በጃኹም ሻንቃኹም ኣብ ሚዛን ኣውድቁ። መስኮት ወይ መንገዲ መንበር ትፈትዉ?
exchanges.tigrinya_phonetic: bejakum shanqakhum ab mizan awdiq-u. meskot wey mengedi menber tfetiw?
exchanges.oromo: Mee suutiikasiin keessan mizaana irratti kaasaa. Fereensa moo karaa qabxii?
exchanges.oromo_phonetic: mey suu-tii-kaa-siin keys-san mi-zaa-na ir-rat-ti kaa-saa. fe-reen-sa moo ka-raa qab-xii?
exchanges.somali: Fadlan, shandadaada miisaanka ku dhig. Ma jeceshahay kursiga daaqad ama kooridoor?
exchanges.somali_phonetic: fad-lan, shan-da-daa-da mi-i-saan-ka ku dhig. ma je-ce-sha-hay kur-si-ga daa-qad a-ma koo-ri-door?
exchanges.hadiyaa: Shokkate, suutiikasii keessan mizaana irratti kaasaa. Fereensa moo karaa qabxii?
exchanges.hadiyaa_phonetic: shok-ka-te, suu-tii-kaa-siin keys-san mi-zaa-na ir-rat-ti kaa-saa. fe-reen-sa moo ka-raa qab-xii?
exchanges.wolayitta: De'iya, suutiikasii keessan mizaana irratti kaasaa. Fereensa moo karaa qabxii?
exchanges.wolayitta_phonetic: de-i-ya, suu-tii-kaa-siin keys-san mi-zaa-na ir-rat-ti kaa-saa. fe-reen-sa moo ka-raa qab-xii?
exchanges.afar: Fadlih, Suutiikasii Keessan Mizaana Irratti Kaasaa. Fereensa moo Karaa Qabxii?
exchanges.afar_phonetic: fad-lih, suu-tii-kaa-siin keys-san mi-zaa-na ir-rat-ti kaa-saa. fe-reen-sa moo ka-raa qab-xii?
exchanges.gamo: De'iya, suutiikasii keessan mizaana irratti kaasaa. Fereensa moo karaa qabxii?
exchanges.gamo_phonetic: de-i-ya, suu-tii-kaa-siin keys-san mi-zaa-na ir-rat-ti kaa-saa. fe-reen-sa moo ka-raa qab-xii?
exchanges.swahili: Tafadhali, weka mkoba wako kwenye mizani. Unapenda kiti cha dirisha au korido?
exchanges.swahili_phonetic: ta-fa-dha-li, we-ka m-ko-ba wa-ko kwe-nye mi-za-ni. u-na-pen-da ki-ti cha di-ri-sha au ko-ri-do?
exchanges.kinyarwanda: Nyamuneka, shyiramo isakoshi yawe kuri gipimo. Ushaka icyicaro cy'idirisha cyangwa umuhanda?

exchanges.kirundi: Nyamuneka, shyiramo isakoshi yawe kuri gipimo. Ushaka icyicaro cy'idirisha cyangwa umuhanda?
exchanges.kirundi_phonetic: nya-mu-ne-ka, shy-i-ra-mo i-sa-ko-shi ya-we ku-ri gi-pi-mo. u-sha-ka i-chi-cha-ro chi-di-ri-sha chan-gwa u-mu-han-da?
exchanges.luo: Kiyie, wek sanduku e scale. Ihero seat e dirisha koso koridor?
exchanges.luo_phonetic: ki-yie, wek san-du-ku e scale. i-he-ro seat e di-ri-sha ko-so ko-ri-dor?

exchanges.speaker: Passenger
exchanges.spanish: Un asiento de ventana, por favor.
exchanges.spanish_phonetic: oon a-syen-to de ven-ta-na, por fa-vor.
exchanges.french: Un siège côté hublot, s'il vous plaît.
exchanges.french_phonetic: un syezh ko-teh u-blo, see voo ple.
exchanges.chinese_pinyin: qǐng gěi wǒ kào chuāng de zuò wèi.

summary.english: A complete airport interaction from check-in to boarding, showing typical exchanges between a first-time passenger and airline staff.
summary.spanish: Una interacción completa en el aeropuerto desde el check-in hasta el embarque, que muestra intercambios típicos entre un pasajero por primera vez y el personal de la aerolínea.
summary.spanish_phonetic: oo-na in-te-rak-syon kom-ple-ta en el ah-eh-ro-pwer-to des-de el chek-in as-ta el em-bar-ke, ke mwes-tra in-ter-kan-byos tee-pi-kos en-tre oon pa-sa-he-ro por pree-me-rah ves ee el per-so-nal de lah ah-eh-ro-li-ne-a
summary.french: Une interaction complète à l'aéroport de l'enregistrement à l'embarquement, montrant les échanges typiques entre un passager pour la première fois et le personnel de la compagnie aérienne.
summary.french_phonetic: oo-n in-te-rak-syon kom-plet a lah-eh-ro-por de lon-re-zhis-treh-mahn a lon-bar-kuh-mahn, mon-tran lez ay-shanj tee-pik an-tre un pa-sa-zhey poor lah preh-myehr fwah ey le per-so-nel de lah kom-pa-nye ah-eh-ryen
summary.italian: Un'interazione completa all'aeroporto dal check-in all'imbarco, che mostra scambi tipici tra un passeggero per la prima volta e il personale della compagnia aerea.
summary.italian_phonetic: oo-nin-te-ra-tsyo-ne kom-ple-ta al-lah-eh-ro-por-to dal chek-in al-lim-bar-ko, ke mo-stra skam-bi tee-pi-chi tra oon pas-sej-je-ro per lah pree-ma vol-ta ey il per-so-na-le del-la kom-pa-nya ah-eh-re-a
summary.chinese: 从值机到登机的完整机场互动，展示首次乘客与航空公司工作人员之间的典型交流。
summary.chinese_pinyin: cóng zhí jī dào dēng jī de wán zhěng jī chǎng hù dòng, zhǎn shì shǒu cì chéng kè yǔ háng kōng gōng sī gōng zuò rén yuán zhī jiān de diǎn xíng jiāo liú.
summary.arabic: تفاعل كامل في المطار من التسجيل إلى الصعود، يظهر التبادلات النموذجية بين مسافر لأول مرة وموظفي شركة الطيران.
summary.arabic_phonetic: ta-faa-ul ka-mil fee al-ma-tar min at-tas-jeel i-la as-su-ood, ya-ther at-ta-baa-dil-at an-nu-mu-tha-ji-ya bay-na mu-sa-fir li-aw-wal mar-ra wa mu-wa-tha-fi shar-ka at-ta-ya-raan.
summary.amharic: ከቼክ ኢን እስከ መብረር የሚደርስ የአየር ማረፊያ ግንኙነት፣ በመጀመሪያ ጊዜ የሚመጣ ተሳፋሪ እና የአየር መንገድ ሰራተኞች መካከል የሚደረጉ የተለመዱ ውይይቶችን የሚያሳይ።
summary.amharic_phonetic: ke-chek in es-ke me-bre-r ye-mi-di-res ye-a-yer ma-re-fi-ya gen-yu-net, be-me-je-me-ri-ya gi-ze ye-mi-me-ta te-sa-fa-ri e-na ye-a-yer menged se-ra-teg-noch me-ka-kel ye-mi-de-re-gu ye-te-le-me-du we-yiy-to-chin ye-mi-ya-shiy.
summary.tigrinya: ምሉእ ትሕዝቶ ናይ መዕረፊ ነፈርቲ ካብ ቼክ-ኢን ክሳዕ ምብራር፣ ንቀዳማይ ግዜ ዝመጽእ ሰፋሪን ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ኣየር መንገድን መንጎ ዝኸውን ተራ ዝዀነ ወራይራ ዘርኢ።
summary.tigrinya_phonetic: mel-u'e t'hizto nay me'erefi neferti kab chek-in k'sa'e mbirar, nqe-da-may gize zmets'e se-fa-rin se-rah-teg-na-tat nay a-yer mengedin mengo zkhe-win te-ra zkhwe-ne we-ray-ra zr'i.
summary.oromo: Seenaa guutuu aanaa xiyyaaraa irraa check-in hanga deebi'uu, akkaataa dhiyeessaa maxxansaa kuftuu yeroo jalqabaa fi hirmaata kaampaanii xiyyaaraa wajjin.
summary.oromo_phonetic: sey-naa guu-tuu aa-naa xiy-yaa-raa ir-raa chek-in han-ga dey-bii-uu, ak-kaa-taa dhi-yees-saa mak-saan-saa kuf-tuu ye-roo jal-qa-baa fi hir-maa-ta kaam-paa-nii xiy-yaa-raa waj-jin.
summary.somali: Isgaarsi buuxa oo ka bilow check-in ilaa la soo galo, muujinaya wada hadal caadi ah oo u dhexeeya rakaabka mar ugu horreysa iyo shaqaalaha shirkadda diyaaradaha.
summary.somali_phonetic: is-gaar-si buu-xa oo ka bi-low chek-in i-laa la soo ga-lo, muu-ji-na-ya wa-da ha-dal caa-di ah oo u dhe-xey-ya ra-kaab-ka mar u-gu hor-ray-sa i-yo sha-qa-a-la-ha shir-kad-da di-yaa-ra-da-ha.
summary.hadiyaa: Heettino maaxxino shaaraawaa ke check-in hanga deebi'uu, ayaa be'iya woyiyto ke awwallaa mo'otta shaaraawaa ke wo wakiila kaampaanii shaaraawaa ke.
summary.hadiyaa_phonetic: hey-ti-no maax-xi-no shaa-raa-waa ke chek-in han-ga dey-bii-uu, a-yaa be-i-ya wo-yiy-to ke a-wal-laa mo-o-tta shaa-raa-waa ke wo wa-kii-la kaam-paa-nii shaa-raa-waa ke.
summary.wolayitta: Heettino aeroporto ke check-in hanga deebi'uu, ayaa wo'iya woyiyto ke issi dobbeesaa aeroporto ke wo wakiila kaampaanii aeroporto ke.
summary.wolayitta_phonetic: hey-ti-no a-e-ro-por-to ke chek-in han-ga dey-bii-uu, a-yaa wo-i-ya wo-yiy-to ke is-si do-bey-saa a-e-ro-por-to ke wo wa-kii-la kaam-paa-nii a-e-ro-por-to ke.
summary.afar: Duudum Ferim Bada ke Check-in hanga Deebi'uu, Muujiya Wada Hadal Caadi Ku-Duudum Safar Awwal wo Wakiil Kaampani Ferim.
summary.afar_phonetic: duu-dum fe-rim ba-da ke chek-in han-ga dey-bii-uu, muu-ji-ya wa-da ha-dal caa-di ku-duu-dum sa-far a-wal wo wa-kiil kaam-pa-ni fe-rim.
summary.gamo: Heettino aeroporto ke check-in hanga deebi'uu, ayaa he'iya woyiyto ke issi oshshaa aeroporto ke wo wakiila kaampaanii aeroporto ke.
summary.gamo_phonetic: hey-ti-no a-e-ro-por-to ke chek-in han-ga dey-bii-uu, a-yaa he-i-ya wo-yiy-to ke is-si osh-shaa a-e-ro-por-to ke wo wa-kii-la kaam-paa-nii a-e-ro-por-to ke.
summary.swahili: Mwingiliano kamili wa uwanja wa ndege kutoka check-in hadi kupanda ndege, unaonyesha mabadilishano ya kawaida kati ya abiria wa mara ya kwanza na wafanyakazi wa kampuni ya ndege.
summary.swahili_phonetic: m-wingi-lia-no ka-mi-li wa u-wan-ja wa n-de-ge ku-to-ka chek-in ha-di ku-pan-da n-de-ge, u-na-o-nye-sha ma-ba-di-li-sha-no ya ka-wai-da ka-ti ya a-bi-ri-a wa ma-ra ya kwan-za na wa-fa-nya-ka-zi wa kam-pu-ni ya n-de-ge.
summary.kinyarwanda: Uburyo bwuzuye bwo kugana mu kimi cy'indege kuva mu check-in kugeza mu kupanda indege, bigaragaza ibiganiro bisanzwe hagati y'umugenzi wa mbere n'abakozi ba kampani y'indege.
summary.kinyarwanda_phonetic: u-bu-ryo bwu-zu-ye bwo ku-ga-na mu ki-mi chi-n-de-ge ku-va mu chek-in ku-ge-za mu ku-pan-da i-n-de-ge, bi-ga-ra-ga-za i-bi-ga-ni-ro bi-san-zwe ha-ga-ti y'u-mu-gen-zi wa m-be-re n'a-ba-ko-zi ba kam-pa-ni yi-n-de-ge.
summary.kirundi: Uburyo bwuzuye bwo kugana mu kimi c'indege kuva mu check-in kugeza mu kupanda indege, bigaragaza ibiganiro bisanzwe hagati y'umugenzi wa mbere n'abakozi ba kampani y'indege.
summary.kirundi_phonetic: u-bu-ryo bwu-zu-ye bwo ku-ga-na mu ki-mi chi-n-de-ge ku-va mu chek-in ku-ge-za mu ku-pan-da i-n-de-ge, bi-ga-ra-ga-za i-bi-ga-ni-ro bi-san-zwe ha-ga-ti y'u-mu-gen-zi wa m-be-re n'a-ba-ko-zi ba kam-pa-ni yi-n-de-ge.
summary.luo: Bed e airport koso check-in gi bor, neno e kamano mar japiny manyien gi jatembe e kompani e ndege.
summary.luo_phonetic: bed e air-port ko-so chek-in gi bor, ne-no e ka-ma-no mar ja-piny ma-nyien gi ja-tem-be e kom-pa-ni e n-de-ge.
